mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hay, Eliza Kortright Monroe, 1786-1840
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Postmarked, March, 1838. Eliza Kortright Hay, Paris, France, to King Louis Phillipe, France. Concerning her bad health and bad financial situation; problems with her father's will; asks for aid, and relates how her father and mother assisted his mother, the Duchess of Orleans during the time period, 1794-1796. 3 pages. Draft of letter.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Eliza Kortright Hay to King Louis Phillipe, France, March, 1838
